page.title: 19PLAYSCHEME,TRENCH, TELFORD.
page.content: The Playscheme was set up to provide after-school activities for local children aged 5 - 12.It is now based in an empty classroom at Teagues Bridge Junior School.On fine days they also use the playground.The scheme is run by Mrs.Pearson and a team of volunteers.It is funded by grants from Wrekin District Council and Telford Development Corporation. A pool table was given by another club which closed down.The money provides for games and equipment such as snooker and table tennis tables,footballs.The scheme runs from 3.15 - 5.00p.m. on Tuesdays during term-time.Children can buy drinks and crisps there.There are now 60 children attending regularly and they can choose from a wide range of activities.No - one has ever been banned from the scheme and there is no vandalism!
